patterns: Can you explain more details about the results?
I have some questions about results.
responses:
There are three types of tumor:Normal, Benign, Malignant
Normal:Everything is fine,nothing to worried about.
Benign:Benign tumors tend to grow slowly and do not spread.It is controllable.
Malignant:Malignant tumors can grow rapidly, invade and destroy nearby normal tissues, and spread throughout the body which is uncontrollable.

patterns: I need to communicate with docter.
responses: Please email doctor with XXXXX for further diagnose.
